meanings.definition: The activity of strengthening and enlarging the muscles of the body through exercise.
meanings.sent1: Bodybuilding requires dedication and hard work to build muscle.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy bodybuilding to stay fit and strong.
meanings.sent3: After a session of bodybuilding, my muscles feel like they've had a good workout.
meanings.sent4: To me, bodybuilding is like sculpting my body into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The gym is filled with the sound of grunts and clinking weights during bodybuilding sessions.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in the activity of strengthening and enlarging the muscles of the body through exercise.
meanings.sent1: The bodybuilder won the competition with his impressive physique.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated bodybuilder who trains every day.
meanings.sent3: The bodybuilder's protein shake spilled all over his gym bag.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bodybuilding, he is a true champion.
meanings.sent5: The bodybuilder's muscles glistened under the stage lights during the competition.
